item.title: Isaiyan add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Whoever fights monsters should see to it that in the process he does not become a monster. And if you gaze long enough into an abyss, the abyss will gaze back into you." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Isaiyan add a quote by Jim Morrison
item.description: "Where's your will to be weird?" -- Jim Morrison

item.title: Isaiyan add a quote by Jim Morrison
item.description: "Whoever controls the media, controls the mind" -- Jim Morrison

item.title: Isaiyan add a quote by Jim Morrison
item.description: "Is everybody in? Is everybody in? Is everybody in? The ceremony is about to begin. The entertainment for this evening is not new, you've seen this entertainment through and through you have seen your birth, your life, your death....you may recall all the rest. Did you have a good world when you died? -enough to base a movie on??" -- Jim Morrison

item.title: Isaiyan add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "I realize all the uncountable manifestations the thinking-mind invents to place wall of horror before its pure perfect realization that there is no wall and no horror just Transcendental Empty Kissable Milk Light of Everlasting Eternity's true and perfectly empty nature." -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: Isaiyan add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "We are nothing. - Tomorrow we may be die. We are nothing. - You and me." -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: Isaiyan add a quote by Isaiyan Morrison
item.description: "I remember when you could get a good, virgin meal for half the price." -- Isaiyan Morrison

item.title: Isaiyan add a quote by Isaiyan Morrison
item.description: "Immediately Chelsea latched onto her wrist and pulled Veronica’s hand toward the cup. “Nonsense.” Chelsea’s eyes narrowed in on Veronica. Her eyes turned black and her mouth opened slightly, revealing her fangs. “Now drink up, researcher. Don’t let a good drink go to waste." -- Isaiyan Morrison

item.title: Isaiyan add a quote by Isaiyan Morrison
item.description: "Remy tilted his head to sniff the air. “I love that smell.” He turned his head to look over his shoulder. “The smell of fear." -- Isaiyan Morrison

item.title: Isaiyan add a quote by Isaiyan Morrison
item.description:
"Standing over her, I took the time to admire my handy work until I realized that I had just killed a potential meal.
“Damn it Bobbi,” I snarled as I kicked her corpse. “Look what you made me do." -- Isaiyan Morrison
